## Tipos de variables 

```{r, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
require(googlesheets4)
require(gt)
require(gtExtras)
require(tidyverse)
require(palmerpenguins)
require(gapminder)
gs4_deauth()
d <- read_sheet("18J1bkmN3UosFHQ5naGwYkJODJxevaFv9RkREhu_3kFY")
```


```{r}
#| echo: false
d %>% 
  mutate(
    nota = ifelse(is.na(nota), "", nota)) %>%
  select(2:5) %>%
  gt()  %>%
  gt::as_raw_html() 
```

## `geom_point()`


::: columns

::: {.column  width="50%"}
```{r}
#| eval: false
#| warning: false
ggplot(data = penguins, 
       mapping = aes(x = bill_length_mm, y = bill_depth_mm)) + 
  geom_point() + 
  theme_classic()
```
:::

::: {.column  width="50%"}
```{r}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
ggplot(data = penguins, 
       mapping = aes(x = bill_length_mm, y = bill_depth_mm)) + 
  geom_point() + 
  theme_classic(base_size = 25)
```
